title: Trump Declares Total War on Congressional Oversight: "We're Fighting All the Subpoenas"
summary: President Donald Trump explicitly declares blanket resistance to congressional oversight, stating "We're fighting all the subpoenas" and dismissing House Democrats as not "impartial people." This marks a systematic escalation from selective resistance to total obstruction of legislative branch oversight authority, representing unprecedented defiance of constitutional separation of powers.

sources.title: Trump at war with Democrats: We're fighting all the subpoenas
